        <api_name>sn_twilio_direct.NotifyTwilioOutboundSMSRecipe</api_name>

        <description/>
        <name>NotifyTwilioOutboundSMSRecipe</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var NotifyTwilioOutboundSMSRecipe = Class.create();
NotifyTwilioOutboundSMSRecipe.prototype = Object.extendsObject(BaseNotifyTwilioSMSRecipe, {
    initialize: function() {
        BaseNotifyTwilioSMSRecipe.prototype.initialize.apply(this, arguments);
    },

    onStart: function(from, to, body, validityPeriod) {
        this.data.fromNo = from;
        var helper = new TwilioHelper();
        var config = helper.getConfig();
        var configValPeriod = config['validity_period'];
        if (!(validityPeriod) || validityPeriod <= 0)
            validityPeriod = configValPeriod;
        this.data.validityPeriod = validityPeriod;
        this.saveData();
        var smsStatusUrl = this.ctx.getXmlUrl('SMSStatus', this.getCallback('onSMSStatus'));
        from = helper.getTwilioServiceId(from);

        var resp = this._sendSmsWithRetry(from, to, body, smsStatusUrl, validityPeriod, 0);
        if (!resp.error) {
            var MessageSid = resp.result.sid;
            if (MessageSid)
                return MessageSid;
        }
    },

    _sendSmsWithRetry: function(from, to, body, smsStatusUrl, validityPeriod, retryNum) {
        if (retryNum > 0) {
            var timeToWait = Math.pow(2, retryNum) * 100;
            this.nutilGlobal.sleep(timeToWait);
        }
        var api = new sn_twilio_direct.TwilioApi();
        var resp = api.sendSms({
            from: from,
            to: to,
            msg: body,
            status_url: smsStatusUrl,
            validity_period: validityPeriod
        });
        if (!resp.error) {
            return resp;
        } else {
            var twilioErrorDetails = JSON.parse(resp.error);
            var errorCodes = this.nutil.getSMSRetryErrorCodes();
            var restErrorCodeMatches = errorCodes.restErrorCode.indexOf(resp.code + '') !== -1;
            var twilioErrorCodeMatches = errorCodes.twilioErrorCode.indexOf(twilioErrorDetails.code + '') !== -1;
            if (retryNum < this.maxRestRetryNum && (restErrorCodeMatches || twilioErrorCodeMatches))
                resp = this._sendSmsWithRetry(from, to, body, smsStatusUrl, validityPeriod, retryNum + 1);
            else {
                gs.error("Could not send message to {0} due to error {1}", to, resp.error);
                this.end();
                throw new global.NotifyInterfaceException(resp.errorJSON ? resp.errorJSON.message : resp.error);
            }
        }
        return resp;
    },

    onSMSStatus: function(p) {
        var payload = p.payload;
        this.nutil.updateMessageStatusFromPayload(p);
        var messageStatus = payload.MessageStatus ? payload.MessageStatus[0] : null;
        if (messageStatus && this.nutil.isFinalMessageStatus(messageStatus))
            this.end();
    },

    type: 'NotifyTwilioOutboundSMSRecipe'
});]]></script>
